CustomField.description:
This is the suggested sales price taking into consideration license term/ and or deal reg source.
Formula is MAX(License Term Discount, Deal Reg Discount) for licenses and MAX(Deal Reg Discount) for Hardware.
CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT(Product_Code_Copy__c,3)="LIC", IF(AND(License_Term_Copy__c<36,NOT(ISBLANK(License_Term_Copy__c))), IF(Deal_Reg_Discount__c, ListPrice*0.75/12, ListPrice/12), IF(AND(License_Term_Copy__c<60,NOT(ISBLANK(License_Term_Copy__c))),IF( Deal_Reg_Discount__c, ListPrice*0.75/12, ListPrice*0.8/12), IF(AND(License_Term_Copy__c<84,NOT(ISBLANK(License_Term_Copy__c))),ListPrice*0.7/12, ListPrice*0.7/12))), IF( Deal_Reg_Discount__c,ListPrice*0.75,ListPrice))
CustomField.label: Suggested Sales Price
